Title: Thin Ice
Writer: Darlene Hunt (created by), Darlene Hunt, Cusi Cram (story editor)
Actors: Laura Linney, Oliver Platt, Gabriel Basso, John Benjamin Hickey
Plot: With Paul (Oliver Platt) recovering from his near-fatal heart attack, and Andrea (Gabourey Sidibe) returning from her African adventure, Cathy (Laura Linney) creates an alter ego as she gets some good news about her chemotherapy trial.
